 Seidel

 PAR = True

 SCREP = False

 T1_2 = 32 
 T1_3 = 32 
 T2_1 = 1 
 T2_2 = 1 
 T2_3 = 1 
 U1 = 10 
 U2 = 8 
 U3 = 1 

Number of ops = 9*T*(N-2)*(N-2)

****************

 T=1024
 N=256,512,1024,2048,4096
****************
